text: Nicole Prascovia Elikolani Scherzinger (née Valiente; born June 29, 1978) is an American singer-songwriter, television personality, and philanthrophist. She was the lead singer of the girl group The Pussycat Dolls. Scherzinger is also known for being a judge on TV talent shows such as The X Factor and The Masked Singer. == Early life == Her father is of Filipino ancestry. Her mother is of Hawaiian and Ukrainian ancestry. Her Catholic parents separated when she was a baby. At age six, she moved to Louisville, Kentucky. She took her German American stepfather's surname when he adopted her. == Career == Scherzinger was one of the group members in Edens Crush after winning a spot from the reality show Popstars. Scherzinger was later a member of the Pussycat Dolls. On November 16, 2007, she released her first solo album, Killer Love. She was a judge on The Sing-Off in 2009 and 2010. She was a judge on The X Factor in the United States in 2011. She was also a judge on The X Factor in the United Kingdom from 2012 to 2017. Scherzinger is also a panellist on The Masked Singer USA. will.i.am is the executive producer of her second album. == Personal life == Since 2006, Scherzinger has had an on-off relationship with Lewis Hamilton.Nicole Scherzinger and Lewis Hamilton step out together She has had bulimia nervosa.I didn't get help for my bulimia == Discography == === Solo singles === Year Title Chart positions Album U.S. UK CAN AUS GER IRE AUT SWI SWE 2007 "Whatever U Like" (featuring T.I.) 104 — 57 — — — — — — Her Name Is Nicole [shelved] "Baby Love" (featuring will.i.am) 108 14 — 58 5 15 21 14 51 "Supervillain" (feat.
